Package net.sf.xpontus.view

This package contains the graphical components of the application

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AboutFormView The about dialog window
ApplyScenarioView Dialog to execute an XSLT scenario
BatchValidationForm  
FontSelection This widget shows a list of installed fonts and allows the user to choose one.
GotoLineFormView A dialog to move the cursor to a specified line
MemoryComboBox a list which remembers the last 10 entries
PaneForm The container which stores document into tabs
ScenarioFormView A dialog to add/edit a scenario
ScenarioListView XSL Scenarios list dialog
SchemaValidationView  
SearchFormView  
SplashScreen The application splash screen
TemplateFormView The template dialog to create new files
XMLDiffFormView  
XPontusCaret The XPontus XML Editor caret which has to blink all the time
